Crowded, noisy, and absolutely wonderful. This bustling Barcelonetta business is a staple for locals and tourists alike. The atmosphere alone is worth the trip, but what will keep you here is the 3€ bottles of cava and equally inexpensive tapas. But don't think for a minute that price here is an indication of quality. With some of the best cava in town, they could easily charge 5€ a glass and still keep a full house. Add to this some of the best chorizo and manchego cheese in a 10km radius, and you'll never want to leave.
